REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1834 reute r f BC-GE-<GE>-GETS-PORTUGUE 04-09 0049

TEXT.TITLE: GE <GE> GETS PORTUGUESE ENGINE ORDER
TEXT.BODY: General Electric Co said it has received a 60 mln dlr order to provide CF6-80C2 engines for three <Airbus Industrie> A310-300 aircraft bought by TAP Air Portugal. It said aircraft deliveries are scheduled to start in late 1988. Reuter
